title: Bangladesh To Extradite Sheikh Hasina From India, Try Her On Mass Killing Charge
content: Bangladesh will take necessary steps to extradite deposed prime minister Sheikh Hasina from India to try her on charges of mass killings during the student-led movement, the chief prosecutor of the country's International Crimes Tribunal said.
summary: Bangladesh will take necessary steps to extradite deposed prime minister Sheikh Hasina from India to try her on charges of mass killings during the student-led movement, the chief prosecutor of the country's International Crimes Tribunal said.

title: First The Middle East, Then Europe - S Jaishankar's Key Meetings This Week
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, who is currently in Saudi Arabia for a key Gulf summit, will travel to Germany and Switzerland later this week on an official visit.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, who is currently in Saudi Arabia for a key Gulf summit, will travel to Germany and Switzerland later this week on an official visit.

title: Tim Cook Explains Why Apple Manufactures iPhones In China. Elon Musk Reacts
content: Ahead of the iPhone 16 series launch, a throwback video of Apple CEO Tim Cook has gone viral on social media where he addresses the common misconceptions about why the US-based company invested in China for manufacturing of its products.
summary: Ahead of the iPhone 16 series launch, a throwback video of Apple CEO Tim Cook has gone viral on social media where he addresses the common misconceptions about why the US-based company invested in China for manufacturing of its products.

title: 3 Israelis Killed In Shooting Near Jordan Border, Gunman Shot Dead
content: It was the first attack of its kind along the border with Jordan since October 7, when Palestinian group Hamas carried out an assault on southern Israel.
summary: It was the first attack of its kind along the border with Jordan since October 7, when Palestinian group Hamas carried out an assault on southern Israel.

title: S Jaishankar's Key Gulf Meet In Saudi Amid India's Big Middle East Push
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar arrived in Saudi Arabia today to take part in the First India-Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) Foreign Ministers' Meeting.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar arrived in Saudi Arabia today to take part in the First India-Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) Foreign Ministers' Meeting.

title: "I'm Sorry, Mom": US Teen's Text To Mother Before Shooting Dead 4 At School
content: The 14-year-old student who shot dead two students and two teachers at his school in US' Georgia had sent an apology text to his mother before he opened fire, his grandfather told the New York Post.
summary: The 14-year-old student who shot dead two students and two teachers at his school in US' Georgia had sent an apology text to his mother before he opened fire, his grandfather told the New York Post.

title: New Virus Discovered In China That Can Affect Brain
content: The virus was first identified in a 61-year-old patient in Jinzhou city in June 2019, who fell ill five days after being bitten by ticks in Inner Mongolia's wetlands
summary: The virus was first identified in a 61-year-old patient in Jinzhou city in June 2019, who fell ill five days after being bitten by ticks in Inner Mongolia's wetlands

title: Prince Harry To Inherit Millions On 40th Birthday From Queen Mother
content: The Duke of Sussex will be eligible to receive a substantial sum on September 15 from a trust established by Queen Elizabeth.
summary: The Duke of Sussex will be eligible to receive a substantial sum on September 15 from a trust established by Queen Elizabeth.

title: Moon Had Surprisingly Recent Volcanic Activity, Samples Confirm
content: Volcanoes were erupting on the Moon as recently as 120 million years ago, evidence collected by a Chinese spacecraft suggests. Until the last few years, scientists had thought volcanic activity ended on the Moon around 2 billion years ago.
summary: Volcanoes were erupting on the Moon as recently as 120 million years ago, evidence collected by a Chinese spacecraft suggests. Until the last few years, scientists had thought volcanic activity ended on the Moon around 2 billion years ago.

title: India's Global Role As PM Sends Ajit Doval With Russia-Ukraine Peace Plan
content: After PM Modi's historic visit to Ukraine, India finds itself in a position to play peacemaker in the years-long Russia-Ukraine war. NSA Ajit Doval will be travelling to Moscow this week to hold crucial discussions in this regard.
summary: After PM Modi's historic visit to Ukraine, India finds itself in a position to play peacemaker in the years-long Russia-Ukraine war. NSA Ajit Doval will be travelling to Moscow this week to hold crucial discussions in this regard.

title: UK Girl, 6, Becomes Youngest To Climb 13,000-Foot Mountain In Africa
content: A six-year-old girl from UK has climbed a 13,600-foot mountain to raise money for the hospital that saved her life as a baby.
summary: A six-year-old girl from UK has climbed a 13,600-foot mountain to raise money for the hospital that saved her life as a baby.

title: Israel-Hezbollah Trade Cross-Border Attacks After Attack Kills 3 In Lebanon
content: The Iran-backed Hezbollah has exchanged near-daily fire with Israeli forces in support of ally Hamas since the group's October 7 attack on Israel.
summary: The Iran-backed Hezbollah has exchanged near-daily fire with Israeli forces in support of ally Hamas since the group's October 7 attack on Israel.

title: "Quietly, Behind Scenes": Prince Harry Secretly In Contact With Royal Family
content: Prince Harry was recently spotted attending the funeral of Lord Robert Fellowes, the husband of Lady Jane Fellowes, and is believed to have "secretly" stayed with his uncle Charles Spencer at Althorp House, the childhood home of Princess Diana.
summary: Prince Harry was recently spotted attending the funeral of Lord Robert Fellowes, the husband of Lady Jane Fellowes, and is believed to have "secretly" stayed with his uncle Charles Spencer at Althorp House, the childhood home of Princess Diana.

title: "Truly Delighted": Rahul Gandhi Gets Warm Welcome In US
content: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi began his three-day visit to the US, arriving in Dallas, Texas, on Sunday, where he was warmly welcomed by members of the Indian diaspora and the Indian Overseas Congress (IOC).
summary: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi began his three-day visit to the US, arriving in Dallas, Texas, on Sunday, where he was warmly welcomed by members of the Indian diaspora and the Indian Overseas Congress (IOC).

title: Venezuela Opposition Leader Leaves For Spain As Diplomatic Tensions Rise
content: Venezuela's former presidential opposition candidate Edmundo Gonzalez has left for Spain in the wake of the South American country's contested election, Venezuelan and Spanish officials said on Saturday.
summary: Venezuela's former presidential opposition candidate Edmundo Gonzalez has left for Spain in the wake of the South American country's contested election, Venezuelan and Spanish officials said on Saturday.

title: "Will Work Openly Like Any Man": How Pak Women Are Facing Economic Crisis
content: According to the United Nations, just 21 percent of women participate in Pakistan's work force, most of them in the informal sector and almost half in rural areas working in the fields.
summary: According to the United Nations, just 21 percent of women participate in Pakistan's work force, most of them in the informal sector and almost half in rural areas working in the fields.

title: Joe Biden Has Taken 532 Off Days As President, Almost 40% Of His Tenure
content: US President Joe Biden has spent a significant amount of time on vacation during his term in office, revealed a recent analysis by the Republican National Committee.
summary: US President Joe Biden has spent a significant amount of time on vacation during his term in office, revealed a recent analysis by the Republican National Committee.

title: "Begged Her Not To Go": Teacher Of American Woman Shot In Head By Israel
content: Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, 26, was shot and killed by Israeli troops when she was taking part in a protest against settlement expansion in the Israeli-occupied West Bank.
summary: Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, 26, was shot and killed by Israeli troops when she was taking part in a protest against settlement expansion in the Israeli-occupied West Bank.

title: Top Iranian Commander Reveals How They Attacked Israeli Ships
content: A top Iranian military commander has said his country had, some time ago, hit 12 Israeli vessels north of the Indian Ocean and elsewhere in response to Israel's attacks on 14 Iranian ships, according to state media.
summary: A top Iranian military commander has said his country had, some time ago, hit 12 Israeli vessels north of the Indian Ocean and elsewhere in response to Israel's attacks on 14 Iranian ships, according to state media.

title: Ajit Doval Headed To Moscow As PM Modi Tries To Broker Russia-Ukraine Peace
content: National Security Advisor Ajit Doval will be travelling to Moscow this week to hold discussions aimed at resolving the Russia-Ukraine conflict, sources have said.
summary: National Security Advisor Ajit Doval will be travelling to Moscow this week to hold discussions aimed at resolving the Russia-Ukraine conflict, sources have said.
